//#pragma comment(linker, "/STACK:16777216")
#include <fstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <complex>
#include <math.h>
#include <set>
#include <vector>
#include <map>  
#include <queue>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stack>
#include <algorithm>
#include <list>
#include <ctime>
#include <memory.h>
#include <ctime> 
#include <assert.h>

#define y0 sdkfaslhagaklsldk
#define y1 aasdfasdfasdf
#define yn askfhwqriuperikldjk
#define j1 assdgsdgasghsf
#define tm sdfjahlfasfh
#define lr asgasgash

#define eps 1e-8
#define M_PI 3.141592653589793
#define bs 1000000007
#define bsize 512

const int N = 1000;

using namespace std;

int tests;
string st;

int main(){
//	freopen("path2.in","r",stdin);
//	freopen("path2.out","w",stdout);
	//freopen("F:/in.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("F:/output.txt","w",stdout);
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	//cin.tie(0);
	
	cin>>tests;
	for (;tests;--tests)
	{
		cin>>st;
		int s=0;
		for (int i=0;i<st.size();i++)
			if (st[i]>=48&&st[i]<=57)
				s+=st[i]-48;
		cout<<s<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
